name: Goodbye Elf
description:
Get the Elf! Draw shapes & use the objects around you to get those shapes to the elf. He's been a bad elf & needs punishment! Guaranteed fun for the whole family.

How to Play:
- Draw shapes & hit the elf
- You cannot draw inside the crossing lines
- Draw shapes around objects to control/use the object

Features:
- 120+ levels of elf goodness
- Physics drawing game
- A new exciting experience
- Test your brain
- Free to Play
